title: Lamentations 5:1
text: REMEMBER, O LORD, what is come upon us: consider, and behold our reproach.

title: Lamentations 5:2
text: Our inheritance is turned to strangers, our houses to aliens.

title: Lamentations 5:3
text: We are orphans and fatherless, our mothers are as widows.

title: Lamentations 5:4
text: We have drunken our water for money; our wood is sold unto us.

title: Lamentations 5:5
text: Our necks are under persecution: we labour, and have no rest.

title: Lamentations 5:6
text: We have given the hand to the Egyptians, and to the Assyrians, to be satisfied with bread.

title: Lamentations 5:7
text: Our fathers have sinned, and are not; and we have borne their iniquities.

title: Lamentations 5:8
text: Servants have ruled over us: there is none that doth deliver us out of their hand.

title: Lamentations 5:9
text: We gat our bread with the peril of our lives because of the sword of the wilderness.

title: Lamentations 5:10
text: Our skin was black like an oven because of the terrible famine.

title: Lamentations 5:11
text: They ravished the women in Zion, and the maids in the cities of Judah.

title: Lamentations 5:12
text: Princes are hanged up by their hand: the faces of elders were not honoured.

title: Lamentations 5:13
text: They took the young men to grind, and the children fell under the wood.

title: Lamentations 5:14
text: The elders have ceased from the gate, the young men from their musick.

title: Lamentations 5:15
text: The joy of our heart is ceased; our dance is turned into mourning.

title: Lamentations 5:16
text: The crown is fallen from our head: woe unto us, that we have sinned!

title: Lamentations 5:17
text: For this our heart is faint; for these things our eyes are dim.

title: Lamentations 5:18
text: Because of the mountain of Zion, which is desolate, the foxes walk upon it.

title: Lamentations 5:19
text: Thou, O LORD, remainest for ever; thy throne from generation to generation.

title: Lamentations 5:20
text: Wherefore dost thou forget us for ever, and forsake us so long time?

title: Lamentations 5:21
text: Turn thou us unto thee, O LORD, and we shall be turned; renew our days as of old.

title: Lamentations 5:22
text: But thou hast utterly rejected us; thou art very wroth against us.
